mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dissolution of co-partnership: The concern of Tinsley & Bryant is this day dissolved by mutual consent / Benj. T. Tinsley, Wilson P. Bryant, July 1st, 1854. A card .. / Wilson P. Bryant. Richmond, July 1st, 1854 : Dear Sir, We have this day associated outselves together for the purpose of conducting a general grocery and commission business, under the style and firm of Tinsley, Tardy & Co. .. / B.T. Tinsley, Richmond, Va., S.C. Tardy, Campbell Co., Va., J.T. Williams, Richmond
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tinsley, Benj. T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Announcement of the dissolution of the firm of Tinsley & Bryant, and the formation of Tinsley, Tardy & Co. The "Card" from Bryant thanks his customers for their patronage and recommends the new firm.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tinsley & Bryant (Firm)
Tinsley, Tardy & Co. (Richmond, Va.)
Grocery trade--Virginia--Richmond
